Organization Name: MHMR OF TARRANT COUNTY | MAIN OFFICE | LOSS TEAM (LOCAL OUTREACH TO SUICIDE SURVIVORS TEAM)
Keywords: Social Services, In Person Crisis Intervention
Description: Provides support and resources to individuals impacted by the suicide of a loved one.

Organization Name: FORT WORTH POLICE DEPARTMENT | POLICE STATION - FELIX | VICTIM ASSISTANCE PROGRAM
Keywords: Social Services, In Person Crisis Intervention
Description: Provides assistance and support services directly to victims of crime. The primary functions of the victim assistance unit include:* Contact victims of crime by letter or telephone to advise of their rights* Provide on-site crisis intervention to highly traumatized victims* Offer referrals and information on community resources to victims of crime* Assist crime victims with filing Crime Victim's Compensation claims* Educate crime victims on the criminal justice process and provide information on the status of their investigation

Organization Name: ACH CHILD AND FAMILY SERVICES | WICHITA CAMPUS | REAL HELP FOR REAL LIFE
Keywords: Social Services, In Person Crisis Intervention
Description: Provides no cost crisis intervention and family preservation counseling services to children, ages 6 - 17, and their families. Also provides skill-building classes for ages 10 to 17. Counseling and skill building classes help youth and families cover topics like anxiety, depression, conflict at home, bullying, anger.

Organization Name: ARLINGTON POLICE DEPARTMENT | POLICE ADMINISTRATION | VICTIM SERVICES PROGRAM
Keywords: Social Services, In Person Crisis Intervention
Description: Provides crisis counseling, crisis intervention, criminal justice support and advocacy as well as information and referral. Gives notification of rights and assists with filing Crime Victim Compensation claims, assistance with property return, court accompaniment, child care during statements as well as transportation to court or to emergency shelter.
